function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $189.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:50 UTC – Details)


With the VTech IS8251-5 5-Handset Cordless Phone featuring the industry’s largest 5″ color base display, managing your communication has never been easier. Assign shortcuts on the large disply for quick access to features that are important to you and easily view all the releveant information from messages left on the answering system. With and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
[Business-grade Cordless Phone built for ease of use at home] VTech IS8251 cordless brings excellent clarity and range, ensuring highest quality in voice communications for business or private calls. Featuring 5″ color base display, large icons, soft keys for seamless call management. Programmable short-cuts for quick access to phone functions that are important to you.
[Enhance efficiency] One-touch access to important contacts; One-touch to call back the caller from listed message or call history; Timer function to help you split your time doing tasks more efficiently.
[Never missed a call] An Virtual 2-line system manages calls from landline and cell-line simonteniously. Pair up to 2 cell phones or one cell phone and one Bluetooth headset for use with landline calls.
[Advanced Digital Answering System] The 5″ color base LCD displays the caller information of the message received, allows you to choose who to listen first from the message list displayed. Extra long 40 mins recording time ensuring all incoming messages captured.
[Smart Call Blocker] Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time.
[Caller ID Announce] The handset and base announce the name of the caller, so you don’t have to scramble for the handset to see who’s calling. With the 5″ base display the caller details are visible more clearly even from farther away


Read more




  • Screen – the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve – avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List – add friend/family’s name, and the exact name of the trusted organization, into the list to ensure their calls will ring through.
  • Block – you can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot with the Call Block button in the base or handset. Add the intruder’s number to the Block List so they will be blocked permanently.


4
Price: $189.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ATOPNUC Mini PC, Powerful & Professional Mini computers.

ATOPNUC Mini computers comes with Windows 11 Pro installed.

Why choose ATOPNUC Mini PC?

-Small size only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inches, ideal portable mobile office computer.-8th Gen Intel Core i5-8279U up to 4.1Ghz, power processing multiple task.-Pre-installed Windows 11 Pro operation system, also supports Ubuntu & Linux.-16GB DDR4 & 512GB SSD, large compacity ensure running multi-tabs no lagging, don’t slow down the operation drastically, flexible expansion: RAM to 32GB maximum, SSD to 1TB maximum.-Dual 4K screen display. support connect with two 4k@30Ghz screen for multiple task handling at the same time.-Multi-Ports more function, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port.-Strong wireless 2.5Ghz+5G dual band WiFi5, 1000 Mb/s Gigabit Ethernet + bluetooth 5.0, Keyboard/Mouse connected works flawlessly.-Quiet Fan work silent, doesn’t overheat. the fan beneath the mini pc. high performance heat dissipation for the hardware.

The feature of ATOPNUC Mini desktop PC:

Specification of ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Processor Intel Coffee Lake i5 8279U (6M Cache, up to 4.1 GHz) Graphics Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 (300 MHz-1.15GHz, support 4K@60Hz) Memory 16GB, Dual-channel DDR4-2400, support DIY up to 32GB Storage 512GB (M.2 PCIE 2280 SSD), support install 1*2.5″ SATA HDD (7 mm), up to 2 TB Operating System Windows 11 Pro , also support Ubuntu & Linux Wireless Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0 & 2.5G+ 5G Dual-Band Wi-Fi Video Output 2* HDMI (4K@30Hz) Audio Output HDMI, Display Port, 3.5mm Audio Jack Gigabit Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN Power Adapter Automatics Voltage adjustment between 100 and 240V AC,50/60Hz, 65Watts(19V/3.42A) VESA Mount Included Kensington Lock Yes Interface 4*USB 3.0 ports， 1* Type-C ports, 2* HDMI port, 1* Gigabit Ethernet Port, 1* TF card reader

Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors

The Mini pc comes with Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors with 4 cores & 8 threads. base operating frequency is 2.40 GHz/s rising to a 4.10 GHz in burst mode.

Large Expandable Storage

The mini desktop computer comes with 16GB DDRS RAM expandable to 32GB maximum and 512GB NVME SSD supports 2.5 inch SSD or HDD expandable 2TB storage capacity (not included)) to expand storage.

Dual 4K@30Hz HDMI Ports

the mini desktop PC equipped with 2 HDMI ports supports 4K@30Hz dual screen display, running the 4K UHD video smooth without any issues.

High performance heat dissipation

This small form factor PC has a user-friendly and intimate design. Fan and heat sink dual boost, cooling the Mini PC when the PC runs the heavy job but a trade-off to keep the PC running efficiently without any issue.

Mini size & Power performance

The mini computers is only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inch, portable design, you can carry it anywhere, perfect mobile office pc for business. even the small pc size but the performance is powerful, parallelly used multi-tabs without any issue and playing multiple web browsing and video windows together definitely works as well.

Easy to Installation with VESA mount

The micro desktop computer shipped with VESA mount, easy to install the PC on the wall or back of the monitor or TV. saving space and convenient carry the PC to anywhere while business trips.

Multiple Application MINI PC

FAQ of the ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Q1: is the Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A: Yes, ATOPNUC mini pc comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. no need activation key.feel free to use other operating system, such as Linux, Ubuntu…

Q2: How to enter BIOS?

A: turn on the portable mini computers firstly. press and hold the ” F2 ” key until enter the BIOS.

Q3: Can i change the operation system?

A:Yes, you can change the operation to Windows 10 or Ubuntu, Linux and others by yourself or contact with us to get the update file.

Q4: How can i enable multi-screen?

A: The small pc comes with dual 4K@30Hz HDMI ports can be extended to connect to two monitors, allowing you to handle multi-task at the same time.

Q5: Is the copact pc noisy when running?

A: To cool the machine’s hardware, ATOPNUC Mini PC only produces about 30 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. silent fan and high performance for the cooling.

Kindly Notes:

Please read the User Manual carefully before using the ATOPNUC Mini PC to learn more about it.

Any questions please feel free to let us know at the first time before you use or need update the software.

Our Type-C port only data transfer, please kindly note it.

Operation System
Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 10 Pro

[Intel i5-8279U Mini PC with Win11 Pro] Mini computers featuring the intel i5-8279U processor, 4 cores 8 thead, 6MB Cache, Max Turbo frequency up to 4.1 Ghz, this mini computers has desktop-grade performance, efficient core able to handle multi-task, the small computer delivers high performance for a widely hom, office, gaming, business use.
[Large Storage Expansion &Quiet] Mini desktop computers comes with high speed 16GB DDR4 memory and 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, allow the computer handle the several operations at the same time, expand the capacity with M2 SSD/NVM2 SSD interface to 1TB or 2.5 inch SATA HDD up to 2TB(not included).
[Multi-Port, Fast transfer] Windows 11 mini computers equipped with 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI 1.4 ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port. , USB-C port support 10Gbps Super speed data transfer. WiFi 2.4G+5G Dual Band networking ensures stable, high-speed data transfers, even in crowded networking environments. Bluetooth 5.0 connect faster Speed, Farther Coverage.
[4K resolution and Dual Display Monitor] The micro desktop computers comes with integrated Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 in stunning 4K UHD resolution, Dual HDMI port ensure connector with two monitors, feel free to enjoy TVs and video, home theater.
[Perfect heat dissipation, Low noise] The ATOPNUC mini computer equipped with the high performance cooling fan, runs quietly cool down the mini desktop pc’s hardare to be perfectly heat dissipation.
Connectivity Technology : LAN
Wireless Comm Standard : 802_11_AC


ATOPNUC Mini PC, Powerful & Professional Mini computers.

ATOPNUC Mini computers comes with Windows 11 Pro installed.

Why choose ATOPNUC Mini PC?

  • -Small size only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inches, ideal portable mobile office computer.
  • –8th Gen Intel Core i5-8279U up to 4.1Ghz, power processing multiple task.
  • -Pre-installed Windows 11 Pro operation system, also supports Ubuntu & Linux.
  • –16GB DDR4 & 512GB SSD, large compacity ensure running multi-tabs no lagging, don’t slow down the operation drastically, flexible expansion: RAM to 32GB maximum, SSD to 1TB maximum.
  • –Dual 4K screen display. support connect with two 4k@30Ghz screen for multiple task handling at the same time.
  • -Multi-Ports more function, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port.
  • -Strong wireless 2.5Ghz+5G dual band WiFi5, 1000 Mb/s Gigabit Ethernet + bluetooth 5.0, Keyboard/Mouse connected works flawlessly.
  • -Quiet Fan work silent, doesn’t overheat. the fan beneath the mini pc. high performance heat dissipation for the hardware.

The feature of ATOPNUC Mini desktop PC:

Specification of ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Processor Intel Coffee Lake i5 8279U (6M Cache, up to 4.1 GHz)
Graphics Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 (300 MHz-1.15GHz, support 4K@60Hz)
Memory 16GB, Dual-channel DDR4-2400, support DIY up to 32GB
Storage 512GB (M.2 PCIE 2280 SSD), support install 1*2.5″ SATA HDD (7 mm), up to 2 TB
Operating System Windows 11 Pro , also support Ubuntu & Linux
Wireless Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0 & 2.5G+ 5G Dual-Band Wi-Fi
Video Output 2* HDMI (4K@30Hz)
Audio Output HDMI, Display Port, 3.5mm Audio Jack
Gigabit Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN
Power Adapter Automatics Voltage adjustment between 100 and 240V AC,50/60Hz, 65Watts(19V/3.42A)
VESA Mount Included
Kensington Lock Yes
Interface 4*USB 3.0 ports， 1* Type-C ports, 2* HDMI port, 1* Gigabit Ethernet Port, 1* TF card reader

Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors

The Mini pc comes with Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors with 4 cores & 8 threads. base operating frequency is 2.40 GHz/s rising to a 4.10 GHz in burst mode.

Large Expandable Storage

The mini desktop computer comes with 16GB DDRS RAM expandable to 32GB maximum and 512GB NVME SSD supports 2.5 inch SSD or HDD expandable 2TB storage capacity (not included)) to expand storage.

Dual 4K@30Hz HDMI Ports

the mini desktop PC equipped with 2 HDMI ports supports 4K@30Hz dual screen display, running the 4K UHD video smooth without any issues.

Read more

High performance heat dissipation

This small form factor PC has a user-friendly and intimate design. Fan and heat sink dual boost, cooling the Mini PC when the PC runs the heavy job but a trade-off to keep the PC running efficiently without any issue.

Mini size & Power performance

The mini computers is only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inch, portable design, you can carry it anywhere, perfect mobile office pc for business. even the small pc size but the performance is powerful, parallelly used multi-tabs without any issue and playing multiple web browsing and video windows together definitely works as well.

Easy to Installation with VESA mount

The micro desktop computer shipped with VESA mount, easy to install the PC on the wall or back of the monitor or TV. saving space and convenient carry the PC to anywhere while business trips.

Read more

Multiple Application MINI PC

FAQ of the ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Q1: is the Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A: Yes, ATOPNUC mini pc comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. no need activation key.feel free to use other operating system, such as Linux, Ubuntu…

Q2: How to enter BIOS?

A: turn on the portable mini computers firstly. press and hold the ” F2 ” key until enter the BIOS.

Q3: Can i change the operation system?

A:Yes, you can change the operation to Windows 10 or Ubuntu, Linux and others by yourself or contact with us to get the update file.

Q4: How can i enable multi-screen?

A: The small pc comes with dual 4K@30Hz HDMI ports can be extended to connect to two monitors, allowing you to handle multi-task at the same time.

Q5: Is the copact pc noisy when running?

A: To cool the machine’s hardware, ATOPNUC Mini PC only produces about 30 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. silent fan and high performance for the cooling.

Kindly Notes:

Please read the User Manual carefully before using the ATOPNUC Mini PC to learn more about it.

Any questions please feel free to let us know at the first time before you use or need update the software.

Our Type-C port only data transfer, please kindly note it.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

The premium Dell Inspiron 15 laptop, with powerful computing and connectivity features, is built for speed, multitasking and collaboration. Sleek, small, durable, the high performing PC delivers unparalleled results and snappy experience for intensive applications or everyday tasks at work, school or life. Super thin and light for easy portability

Processor
The powerful 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6 MB cache, 2 cores, 4 threads, up to 4.10 GHz Turbo)

Memory
16GB RAM invigorates powerful multitasking and seamless experience

Hard Drive
1TB HDD delivers instant boot-up, fast data access

Display & Graphics
15.6″, FHD 1920×1080, 60Hz, Non-Touch, AG, WVA, LED-Backlit, Narrow Border Display delivers a clear, crispy image that’s easy on your eye; Intel UHD Graphics

Operating System
Windows 11 Pro (64-bit) – perfect for business/education

Ports
1 USB 2.0, 2 USB 3.2 ports – for quick data transfers
1 SD-card slot
1x HDMI – for connecting to HDTV or monitor
1x Headphone output/Microphone input combo – with studio-quality sound
720p at 30 fps HD camera with microphone – ready for remote work and online class

Premium Features
Wireless Connectivity: 802.11ac 1×1 WiFi and Bluetooth
Warranty:1-year manufacturer warranty
Battery: 3 Cell, 41 Wh, integrated – long lasting battery life

[POWERFUL PERFORMANCE]: The Dell Inspiron Laptop is powered with the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6 MB cache, 2 cores, 4 threads, up to 4.10 GHz Turbo) and 16GB high-bandwidth DDR4 memory, powerful processing for advanced multitasking, demanding computing, smooth gaming, multiple tabs browsing, and everyday tasks. 1TB HDD offers ample storage, quick boot-up times, fast data access, and improves the overall performance
[PREMIUM DESIGN]: Designed to last through regular use, with tiny rubber feet and bumpers on the hinge that keep it from skidding and provide additional stability when on hard surfaces. Work in comfort thanks to a lift hinge that raises your device to an ergonomic angle, which provides a more comfortable typing angle. Get an expansive keyboard with a numeric keypad, 6.4% larger keycaps and a spacious touchpad that makes it easier to navigate your content.
[STUNNING VISUALS]: Get more screen in a 15.6″ laptop with three-side narrow borders for an immersive FHD viewing experience. Dell ComfortView Low Blue Light Software solutions help reduce harmful blue light emissions and optimize eye comfort over extended viewing. Comes with ExpressCharge capabilities that minimize the time you spend tethered to an outlet and will recharge your battery up to 80% in 60 minutes.
[COLLABORATION READY]: Windows 11 Pro 64-bit, protects your data with enterprise-grade security, boosts productivity with powerful management tools, and keeps going with long battery life. A built-in HD webcam that makes you look great.
[HIGH EFFICIENCY]: The windows laptop PC is sensibly optimized for efficiency: 802.11ac 1×1 WiFi and Bluetooth for seamless experience with videos/music. 1x 720p at 30 fps HD camera, 1x Stereo speakers with Waves MaxxAudio Pro, 1x Headphone output/Microphone input delivers cinema experience, ready for remote work, online class, virtual communication. 1-year manufacturer warranty.

Product Description

Out of Sight Power

High performance

The OptiPlex 790, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving Micro chassis.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core CPU, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3GHz Storage: 500GB HDD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 2.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like DP port, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Dual display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

The combination of key integrated components allows this computer to excel at work, home or school. DDR3 RAM allows for efficient multi-tasking, and abundant hard drive space provides ample room to store files, apps, music and movies.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 790 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 790 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

Three-hand Quartz: This watch movement features a quartz crystal that oscillates when a current is applied to it.Multifunction: A Quartz movement with two separate sub-eyes for 1/10 seconds / seconds and date function.Chronograph: A multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality.
